title: Jellyfin Media Server LXC
textContent:
Jellyfin Media Server LXC 
                With Privileged/Unprivileged Hardware Acceleration Support
                To create a new Proxmox VE Jellyfin Media Server LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE
                        Shell.
                Copy  bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/jellyfin.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                Jellyfin Media Server Interface: IP:8096
                FFmpeg path: /usr/lib/jellyfin-ffmpeg/ffmpeg
outerHTML:
Jellyfin Media Server LXC

With Privileged/Unprivileged Hardware Acceleration Support

To create a new Proxmox VE Jellyfin Media Server LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

  bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/jellyfin.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Jellyfin Media Server Interface: IP:8096

FFmpeg path: /usr/lib/jellyfin-ffmpeg/ffmpeg
